title: Batch-of-Thought: Cross-Instance Learning for Enhanced LLM Reasoning
summary: Current Large Language Model reasoning systems process queries independently, discarding valuable cross-instance signals such as shared reasoning patterns and consistency constraints. We introduce Batch-of-Thought (BoT), a training-free method that processes related queries jointly to enable cross-instance learning.
